channel.title: [PvP] [Survival] [Semi-Vanilla] WanderCraft a New PvP Experience
channel.description:
[size=18pt][u]Welcome to WanderCraft[/u][/size] [size=12pt]WanderCraft is a new semi-vanilla PvP experience. Here at WC, we're all about ensuring you enjoy a fun and simple PvP experience. NO confusing plugins and NO Factions. Our motto is "Keep it simple." We assure you that you will have a fun time on WanderCraft. [/size]
[size=12pt]Enjoy intense PvP at our Battlefield. No more players running into safe zones after attacking someone, and no more combat logging. Anything concern you? Ask an admin in game.
[size=14pt]We have donations set up to reward players and give players a boost in game for supporting us.
[size=4]Have fun, Chubykid3, owner of WanderCraft.[/size]
[size=24pt]IP PORT NEEDED: 108.174.61.11:25665[/size][color=orange]

item.title: [PvP] [Survival] [Semi-Vanilla] WanderCraft a New PvP Experience
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I’d say this is probably a little too simple for my liking. I mean, simplicity only goes so far before it becomes more of a philosophical question than a question of practicality. Each to their own, I guess.

Read full topic
